Name: Elle for Leather
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
STRAIN into glass filled with crushed ice.
TOP with sparkling wine and briefly stir.
Review: A long, cooling cocktail pepped up with fizz and scotch whisky, smoothed with vanilla liqueur. Easy drinking.
History: Created in 2001 by Reece Clark at Hush Up in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Elle for Leather contains 239 calories
